decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design, Access & Heritage Statement, Flood Risk Assessment, TreeRadar GPR Tree Root Investigations Operational Overview and Root Mapping Report dated November 2017 from Peter Barton Associates, Tree Report from Peter Barton Associates, and 1707/PL.00 received: 21/12/2017. 1707/PL.01 received: 02/01/2018. 1707/PL.02 received: 26/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the first floor side and rear elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extensions hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The proposals shall be implemented in accordance with the Outline Arboricultural Method Statement contained within the approved Tree Report from Peter Barton Associates received: 21/12/2017.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension following demolition of existing outbuilding and a first floor rear infill extension
